mapper.select: select u.username, c.name as category_name, a.id, a.title, a.head_image, a.content, a.user_id, a.category_id, a.status, a.publish_time, a.created_time, a.modified_time, a.comment_num, a.read_num, a.is_comment from a_article a left join u_user u on a.user_id = u.id left join a_category c on a.category_id = c.id where a.id = #{id}
SELECT sum(read_num) as readNum, sum(comment_num) as commentNum FROM `a_article` where user_id = #{userId}
